ygData.subject: Re: List Activity and forming a group?
ygData.msgSnippet: When you hit 20 4 necros with pets can drop giants
ygData.messageBody:
When you hit 20 4 necros with pets can drop giants


>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] List Activity and forming a group?
>Date: Tue, 7 Sep 1999 06:57:59 -0700 (PDT)
>
>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
>It's great to see this list finally taking off.
>
>On a separate note, seems like there is a few Quellious necromancers in
>the teen levels. Perhaps we should join up one day and form a "super
>group"? I'd love to see what 6 necros with 6 pets and lifedrains could
>do.
>
>Darkmoon
>Dark Elf
>Level 14
>Quellious
>
>
> >
> > I have noticed that there are currently 163 members
> > on this list. For this amount of people we should
> > be seeing a lot more activity. Lets try to keep
> > this list going by helping each other out. Even if
> > you don't have a question, just let us know how
> > things are going in game or let us know how your
> > gaming has been going so far. I think one way to do
> > this is everyone should send in a mail with their
> > characters info (Name, Level, Race, Server, etc.).
> > This would help the rest of us to see who all is on
> > our individual servers and hopefully make friends to
> > adventure with. I guess I will start this off since
> > it's my idea.
> >
> > Branil
> > Dark Elf
> > 14th Level
> > Quellious
> >
> > Currently camped in the Lake Rathe zone at the gnoll
> > camp. If you see me in game give me a tell.
>
>
>
